1:
À Dagwi, hwo de me somo kayɛ jeng,
hwo sǎ yuu gbak wɛt!
2:
Bemât neves na vê kwɛlsɛng ba ga hwo me,
be yɛt nebɔs e ra me.
3:
Bé tɛ̀ me e tē, be ra repugu me,
be hwosom me, vit a retin.
4:
Ma tɛ̀ yey na yɛn, me ra won yaga yɛn,
ko be tala me na neves.
5:
Be tala me na neves e tô pyɛ́ ryat,
be bɛɛ me ves, mwa ano de me tɛ̀ yey na yɛn.
6:
Bē tɛ̀ mwât shɔt vwes e ra yɛ,
tik mwât nuha a tɛ̀ sekun mɛ.
7:
Tik be ra a yɛ shɔt, be gang ɛ na yɛ.
À Dagwi, tɛ̀ won mɛ he se renɛn!
8:
Tik nepɔlɔ mɛ ne sè tyɔng,
tik mwat hwak a jut kwɔn mɛ hê mwat nuyel!
9:
Tik nèy mɛ ne tɛ́ ɛn nehyɛn,
ko hwā mɛ a tɛ́ ɛ kuma!
10:
Tik nèy mɛ ne sǎ e barin,
ko ne kyě gǎ yikyik e de won.
11:
Tik mwat de e rangal hɛ du, a sey ɛ mwa pyɛ de a vɔk,
tik bemat beduk be hashe pyɛ́ de a ga yɔ́m ɛ e ra yɛ!
12:
Mwat hwak a to dura a yɛ nerat
kɛ a tosho reyɔm nehyɛn mɛ wɛt!
13:
Tik be wey na kwɔ̀rɔ mɛ hywiri,
bē ye bam a reza mɛ e zamâng vey!
14:
Tik na Dagwi Darwey a sang ye bam a banɛ̂n bedabeda mɛ
kɛ be sang fugut banɛ̂n neng mɛ wɛt!
15:
Tik na Dagwi Darwey a bare na banɛn mɛn o kayɛ jeng,
tik na a tɛ̀ be ye bam a baza mɛn e jey!
16:
Yaga mwat o a bare na a dura nerat wɛt,
a tak a bepɛng na vemo de ba bidɛ sɛlɛ,
vemo de vit a hɛn na yey ting, a tak a yɛn sɛ̌ ba kushu.
17:
A wok netâ mok a bemat gawey, a remo, tik gawey he hwo e ra yɛ!
A simo mok a bemat nerat wɛt, à remo, tik nerat ne sè shan na yɛ!
18:
Sede remo de e tɛ̀sɛ berugu kayɛ jeng,
ano de e mok a bemat gawey.
Tik gawey o he yel a yɛ e bek sede nshî sɔ,
sede něy de na kyè mwa vɔk e bekup me!
19:
Tik gawey o he sè sede gworugu de a bang ɛ mɛ,
sede gyindi de e tɛ̀sɛ kayɛ jeng!
20:
Tik na gawey hane he sè pyɔlɔ de Dagwi Darwey e nɔ̂ng
vemo de be tɛ̀sɛ sekun hom,
vemo de be ha ha ves e ra me.
21:
Hwo à Dagwi Darwey, Darwey hom,
rá a me tyɛng na nerey mō,
sey me, yaga hwà sé rwat,
ko hwà tɛ̀ yey na me.
22:
Ma sé pɛ́ng-pɛng, ma bidɛ sɛlɛ,
ba ga kata a me yey.
23:
Mê kwɔ̂k ye shǔt sede zinâ nawiri,
ma sé sede yɔrɔ de gul gwo gangas.
24:
Bakwot hom ba sé gbɛrɛk yi na wusal hal,
ma ga sɔ́ me, ma ga tɛ́ me gwɔshɔk.
25:
Ma sé pyɛ byɛs na vê sekun hom,
jeng de be di me, be digis bato mɛn.
26:
À Dagwi Darwey, Dagwi hom, sɛlɛ me,
sey me, yaga hwà tɛ̀ yey na me kayɛ jeng.
27:
Ano, vê repugu hom bê tɔk, e hwo de hwà ra ano,
e hwo, à Dagwi Darwey de hwà sey me.
28:
Yɛn e mok a me gawey, ko hwo, hwô tɛ̀ a me nerat.
Yɛn e hwo e ra me, ko yɛn ê de vo rekyen.
Ko me, mwât fwom mō, mê vɔk yey pyɛng sizɔng.
29:
Tik be kyiri vê tɛ́sɛ kun hom na rekyen,
tik rekyen mɛn re kyiri hɛn sede gworugu!
30:
Ma rɔda feng a Dagwi Darwey na gbɔng fwɔ,
mê somo hɛ e ji regyêng bemat;
31:
Yaga e dul bepɛng,
e sey ɛn yi e vemo de be tɛ̀, be gang ɛn na shɔt.
